s: Summary: Avalanche Convergence session dissecting the five‑layer architecture for RWA tokenization and stablecoin integration.
Topics: Stablecoins, real‑world asset tokenization, compliance frameworks, cross‑chain liquidity, regulatory tech.
Speakers: Ru Wang (Avalanche), Jacky Kong (Ava Labs), Xuanfeng Hu (FinChain), Flora Lau (Hang Feng), plus panelists from Tether, HashKey, Gate, StraitsX and Evolve.
r: Learn Avalanche’s end‑to‑end RWA tokenization blueprint.
Engage with regulators and tokenizers shaping the trillion‑dollar market.
Explore partnership pipelines for compliant stablecoin issuance.
